Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using K562 cells, a CML cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: E526K increased phosphorylation levels by 150% compared to wild-type.
E526Q reduced phosphorylation levels by 60% compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PDGFRB was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels greater than 100% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels deviating by ≥30% from wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using K562 cells, a CML cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: E526K increased luciferase activity by 200% compared to wild-type.
E526Q reduced luciferase activity by 70% compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PDGFRB was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Luciferase activity greater than 100% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Luciferase activity deviating by ≥30% from wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using K562 cells, a CML cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: E526K increased cell surface PDGFRB expression by 120% compared to wild-type.
E526Q reduced cell surface PDGFRB expression by 50% compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PDGFRB was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell surface PDGFRB expression greater than 100% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell surface PDGFRB expression deviating by ≥30% from wild-type.
